document_data.name: Veil of Djalice
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Veil of Djalice''''', also called the '''''glamour glamer''''', was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[illusion]] [[spell]] used by priests devoted to [[Sune]], enabling them to temporarily enhance a target's beauty to otherworldly levels.

This spell was named after the priestess [[Djalice]] who developed it.
document_data.Effects: This spell altered the target's beauty and grace to unimaginable levels. Individuals of the same race as the target were completely smitten with them for the spell's duration provided they were not [[deaf]] or blind. The ''veil of Djalice'' lasted for six minutes.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
